title: calamEla
sahitya:
clamEla jEsEvurA cAla ninu nammina nApai


anupallavi

  valacina ninnu vaddiki rammani kalakalamani palukanu nAtO


caraNam 1    nannu ganna taNDri nA bAdha tIrppumani nItO palumAru blkakA 
canuvuna nannu cEra dIsi cAla manasu ranjilla mATlATaka inta
    caraNam 2    para daivamula prArttimpan taramu gAdani morabeTTaga 
saraguna nannu jaTiyakumani duritamu lella tolagimpaka inta
    caraNam 3    nI pAda bhakti niNTAru jEsE gOpAladAsa pApa hara 
nI prApu kOri niNTAru nAmamE proddu bhajiyimpu cuNTa nApi
